channel.title: Web3 Thoughts on TL;DR
channel.description: Recent content in Web3 Thoughts on TL;DR

item.title: TL;DR #011 - New way to approach crypto product, Frames
item.description: In this TL;DR, discover a new way way to build crypto product and what is Farcaster Frame.

item.title: TL;DR #009 - Justice as Fairness; Institutionalization and Network Success
item.description: In this TL;DR, discover how can we better design platforms and governance systems to promote fairness in web3. In the second part, why a particular product attains and maintains market dominance.
